scripts.dev:webapp: mkdir -p logs && FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm turbo dev --filter=webapp... 2>&1 | tee >(while IFS= read -r line; do echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $line"; done > logs/webapp-dev.$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H').log)
scripts.dev:mcp-api: mkdir -p logs && cd apps/mcp-api && FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm dev 2>&1 | tee >(while IFS= read -r line; do echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $line"; done > ../../logs/mcp-api-dev.$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H').log)
scripts.dev:emulators:with-data: mkdir -p logs && firebase emulators:start --import=.data/emulators/firebase-data --only auth,firestore 2>&1 | tee logs/firebase-emulators.$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H').log
scripts.clean:packages: turbo run clean && pnpm exec rimraf --glob **/.turbo
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:tsc && pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm run clean:node_modules && rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml
